full_description:
ASRock H470M-HDV/M.2 10th Gen Micro ATX Motherboard

The ASRock H470M-HDV/M.2 Micro ATX Motherboard supports 10th Gen Intel Core Processors (Socket 1200). It has a 7 Power Phase Design, it offers enhanced performance with the lowest temperature for advanced gamers. Complete with all three types of most used connectors. It features Dual Channel DDR4 Memory Technology and supports DDR4 2933/ 2800/ 2666 / 2400 / 2133 non-ECC, un-buffered memory. It has 2 x DDR4 DIMM Slots. It comes with a 7.1 CH HD Audio (Realtek ALC897 Audio Codec). It supports Intel Turbo Boost Max 3.0 Technology. It comes with 128Mb AMI UEFI Legal BIOS with multilingual GUI support. It has a High-Density Glass Fabric PCB design that reduces the gaps between the PCB layers to protect the motherboard against electrical shorts caused by humidity. You can also easily optimize your system and keep your motherboard up to date with ASRock Live Update & APP Shop.

Ultra M.2 32 Gb/s (PCIe Gen3 x4 & SATA3)

ASRock H470M-HDV/M.2 10th Gen Motherboard has 4 x SATA3 6.0 Gb/s Connectors and supports RAID. It has a Micro ATX Form Factor and Solid Capacitor design. It offers 4 SATA3, 1 Ultra M.2 (PCIe Gen3 x4 & SATA3). The PCIe Gen3 x4 Ultra M.2 interface pushes data transfer speeds up to 32Gb/s. In addition, it also supports SATA3 6Gb/s M.2 modules and is compatible with ASRock’s U.2 Kit for installing some of the world’s fastest U.2 PCIe Gen3 x4 SSDs. Besides the onboard LAN port, users may also choose 802.11ac wireless connections by M.2 (Key E) slot.

3 Graphics Outputs

The ASRock H470M-HDV/M.2 is packed with a D-Sub + DVI-D + HDMI combo. Plus the HDMI port supports 4K resolution. It supports HDMI 1.4 with max. resolution up to 4K x 2K (4096x2160) @ 30Hz, DVI-D with max. resolution up to 1920x1200 @ 60Hz and D-Sub with max. resolution up to 1920x1200 @ 60Hz.

The ASRock H470M-HDV/M.2 10th Gen Motherboard comes with 3 years warranty.

3 Graphics Outputs

It comes with a D-Sub, DisplayPort, and HDMI combo. It supports HDMI 2.1 TMDS compatibility with a maximum resolution of 4K x 2K (4096 x 2160) at 60 Hz. It also supports DisplayPort 1.4 with DSC (compressed) max. resolution up to 8K (7680x4320) at 60Hz and 5K (5120x3200) at 120Hz. D-Sub with a maximum resolution of up to 1920x1200 at 60 Hz. It comes with support for HDCP 2.3, HDMI 2.1 TMDS compatibility, and DisplayPort 1.4 ports.

The ASRock H610M-HDV/M.2 Motherboard has 03 years warranty.
